import React from "react"; import "./Cards.css"; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import CardItem from "./CardItem"; import Invitation from "./invitation"; import SearchRecipes from "./SearchRecipes"; import { mostPopular } from '../DAL/api' function Cards() { const [firstSection, setFirstSection] = useState([]) const [secondSection, setSecondSection] = useState([]) useEffect(async () => { const getRecipes = await mostPopular() setFirstSection(getRecipes.slice(0,3)) setFirstSection(getRecipes.slice(3,6)) setRecipes(getRecipes) }, []) return (
); } export default Cards;
